name: United Postage (UP!)
description:
In UP! (United Postal) you play as a determined delivery person following their creed to deliver packages, no matter the circumstances. Naturally, this means fighting to the death with a vibrant sword in hand. This aligns with both the theme (delivery) and special object (sword). The controls are A and D for movement, SPACE to jump, LEFT CLICK to attack and RIGHT CLICK to interact. The goal of the game is to deliver as many packages as possible before the enemies overtake you.

Created by: Blake Glenn-Reller, Chloe Ng, Cody R. Melvin, ConsiderTheSun, Evelyn Cullen, Freddie "ShayLinuxLycan" Riley, Mason Thompson, Sakura "Ai" Shih, Styr0foam
